name: My heart will go on
description:
My heart will go on is a VR game where you have to control the blood circulation made in a gamejam (48h) by a team of 6 people.

programmers:  Jean-René Choinière, Maxim Daigle, Patrice Robitaille
artists:                  Raphaëlle Dubois, Mikhael Beauparlant
audio:                    Xavier-Charles Fecteau
